package.name: vadd_publisher
package.description:
A a trivial vector-add ROS 2 publisher. Adds two inputs to a vector in a loop and publishes on the go at 10 Hz. An emulation of the target hardware shows that it's not able to meet the rate target and stays in between 2-4 Hz.
The objective of this package is to generate a computationally expensive baseline when executed in a general purpose embedded CPU. See "accelerated_vadd_publisher" package for an optimized and accelerated_vadd_publisher version of the same package which offloads the vector operations into an FPGA.
package.author: Víctor Mayoral Vilches
